column5: "Party committees, governments and relevant departments at all levels must put people's lives and health first," Chinese President Xi Jinping said. "It is necessary to release epidemic information in a timely manner and deepen international cooperation." https://t.co/RkC5kHFrbr

The Wuhan epidemic shows why democratic institutions matter. 

In a crisis like this, you need information you can trust and institutions you can trust to do the right thing. 

In other words: You need a free press, and you need a government that is accountable to its people. https://t.co/IH8cCSUWWe

It's only a matter of time before there's a serious epidemic of some kind. This could be the prelude to one. It's no laughing matter and no joke. We must prevent and defend at all costs or many people will die. https://t.co/rs6WrMGUoX
There is very little trust in official numbers in China, contributing to growing panic over #WuhanCoronavirus (yes, my family is among those who have canceled holiday trips) https://t.co/d3yb07mBGJ

@CBCAlerts @GovCanHealth #TheresaTam isnâ€™t being proactive and we will all remember her message when infections start spreading. She is putting the lives of our health care workers at risk and the general population! @cdc needs to be involved immediately!

@MattFrieman @hayesluk Introducing @hayesluk, the external expert that needs to be brought in on a chartered government plane. Reminds me of Prof. Robert Langdon (Dan Brown novels). We need him....we need Hayes...the epidemic...its spreaaadding.... (Aziz Ansari style).

Heroin & fentanyl overdoses are at epidemic levels. We need bold action.

We need safe injection sites so that people can use safely, not overdose, & ultimately transition into recovery services.

Weâ€™re working to pass legislation to make that happen. https://t.co/RQ3JMg14gd

Nearly two decades after the disastrously handled SARS epidemic, China appears determined not to repeat its past mistakes as a new viral outbreak has spread. Chinese President Xi Jinping said people's lives and health must be put first. https://t.co/S8itXjOJgX
